in the Making
Southern Legacy 
French Quarter Inn

Carefully Curated, Always Inspiring

A distinctive luxury hotel for sophisticated travelers, French Quarter Inn offers guests a nuanced experience while visiting one of the country’s most inspiring destinations. Here, Old World charm meets Charleston’s authentic Southern hospitality with extensive daily amenities in a comfortably upscale setting.
Read More 
Delight in Every Bite

Complimentary Breakfast

Indulge in a complimentary European artisanal breakfast every day of your stay. Breakfast can be enjoyed in your room, at our lobby, or on our courtyard terrace.
Read More 
Delight in Every Bite

Wine & Cheese Reception

Enjoy a diverse selection of cured meats, cheeses, and other delightful bites in our lobby before you step out for the evening.
Read More 
Delight in Every Bite

Cocktail Corner

Treat yourself to a flavorful cocktail or order your favorite spirit on the rocks at our charming lobby bar.
Read More 
Delight in Every Bite

Cookies & Milk

Start winding down for the evening with pre-turndown treats that include freshly baked cookies and milk served in the lobby.
Read More Meetings & Events 
Designed for Warm Conversations

Inspired by the Holy City and its European ties, our Inn is a sanctuary for those seeking to experience something beyond the ordinary. Plan an event where your guests feel welcomed into a thoughtful atmosphere, a refined gathering with attentive service.

Location

Stitched Into the
Fabric of the Holy City 
Defined by cobblestone streets, iconic horse-drawn carriages, and pastel-hued Southern mansions, Charleston’s French Quarter district is a symbol of elegance, sophistication, and inspiration. It is often regarded as the Holy City’s cultural, historical, and artistic haven just footsteps away from the bustling City Market and top dining, shopping, and cultural destinations.
Explore Charleston 
You’reCordially Invited
